urls.title: Log in to Twitter / Twitter
urls.description: Log in to Twitter to see the latest. Join the conversation, follow accounts, see your Home Timeline, and catch up on Tweets from the people you know.

data.text: @PeggyThorpe @PeggyThorpe Hi Peggy! Please send us a DM: https://t.co/Z2ZXDJAzNk with your reservation details so that we can look into this for you and provide you with the most accurate information. - C

@larz45 @larz45 Hi Lars! We are sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/XdgLxuJ894 with your reservation details and the specifics of your request so we can see what options are available. - C

data.text: @MarissaMarchena @Enterprise @MarissaMarchena We're sorry to hear that you are experiencing a disruption in your service. If you are in need of assistance and have not done so already, please send us a DM: https://t.co/Oktnmhft8i w/ your reservation details so that we can review your options w/ you. - C

@katy7579 @katy7579 We are so sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. Our records indicate that we have a DM open with you regarding your cancelled flight. You may continue correspondence with us there at your convenience. - C

@JayNisbett @JayNisbett Hi Jay! If you need help with an existing reservation, please send us a DM: https://t.co/mmllqFD5hq with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. We will be happy to review your options with you. - C

data.text: @alisha484 @SouthwestAir @alisha484 Hi Alisha! We're sorry to hear of your frustration. If you're seeking information on a specific flight, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/TspqatWIY0 w/ your reservation details and the specifics of your inquiry. @EYenn @EYenn We are very sorry to hear about your frustrations. Please feel free to send us a direct message if you are in need of any assistance as we would be happy to help. https://t.co/Kz3gqRdK5v -Nicole

@ThingsKupidsays @ThingsKupidsays I'm really sorry to hear that the hold time is high! Please feel free to send us a private message with your itinerary information so someone from our team can assist you! - SG

data.text: @mahoney_lisa @mahoney_lisa Hi Lisa! All of our team members are required to wear face coverings at all times while performing their duties. Our records indicate that we have already taken this information from you in a FB PM and have forwarded it to the proper parties for investigation. -C

@hyatt_craig @hyatt_craig Hi Craig! Thanks for reaching out to us. If you are in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/Xg5BLnYV7L with the specifics of your request. We will be happy to help you. - C

@liz_eaddy @liz_eaddy Hi there! We are sorry to hear about this situation. If you are in need of assistance or would like us to look into the events that took place, please send us a DM: https://t.co/RhU11syRLm with your reservation details - C

data.text: @elyssaa Hi @elyssaa! Unfortunately, we would not reschedule a flight after cancelling it. This is because we wont cancel a flight until we have exhausted all other options first. Please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/HjSo0FGThO if you have further questions or concerns. - C
@MelanieFineRea1 @MelanieFineRea1 Beautiful photo! Thanks for flying with us! - SG

📸: kyle_vanderberg https://t.co/lcGOWKfyfE

data.text:
@BVojtkofsky @AmericanAir @united @Delta @BVojtkofsky Hi Bradley! Thanks for the shoutout and thank you so much for recognizing our efforts. We look forward to welcoming you aboard again soon! 🙂 - C
#togetherwefly
@lexissmariah_ Hi @lexissmariah_ ! We're sorry to learn about your experience. If you need assistance, please send us a direct message. - Lupe
All smiles here! #GoingTheDistance https://t.co/JJMVMlG02H

@CoachWexler @CoachWexler Hello Mike! We love seeing this and are honored to serve you and your family! Thank you so much for your support and for sharing your positive experience. Here's to many more flights to come! - C
#togetherwefly

@jasbee9 @jasbee9 We're disappointed to hear this. All customers are required to wear a face covering at all times while traveling. Our team members are expected to enforce our policies to the best of their abilities. Please send us a DM so that we can conduct an internal investigation. C

@mooremattersllc @mooremattersllc Hello! We're extremely disappointed to hear about this. All customers are required to wear a face covering at all times while traveling. Please send us a DM with your reservation details and the specifics of your experience so we can investigate this matter. -C
@imagewords @imagewords Loving the mask! ;) - Lupe
@TylerCoolGuy88 @TylerCoolGuy88 Thanks for sharing. We love seeing these kinds of photos! - Lupe

@_balissbby @_balissbby Hi there! We're sorry to hear that you bag has been delayed. If you are in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a DM with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. We will gladly help you in any way we can. - C

@directedbyrian @directedbyrian We'd like to look into the situation you are describing. If you are willing to, please send us a DM: https://t.co/8UzXap6yDW with your reservation details and specifics of your experience so that we can conduct and internal investigation. - C

@directedbyrian @directedbyrian The safety of our passengers is our #1 priority. Customers are required to wear a face covering over their nose and mouth at all times when traveling. For all the safety measures we have put in place, go to https://t.co/tXzNRnPjY4 Plz send us a DM w/ concerns. - C

data.text: @jclongchamp @jclongchamp We're sorry to hear about this and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you may be experiencing. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/5JoT7EhT4h with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. - C

data.text: If you're flying with us this October, don't be surprised if you see us thinking pink for Breast Cancer Awareness Month. #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/2ixYMb3Cmn

@ETOverton @ETOverton Hi Eric. We're sorry for any inconvenience you have experienced. Unfortunately, operational challenges sometimes create disruptions in service with little notice. If you need assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/e55KOliydn and we will gladly help you. - C

@gish_dylan @gish_dylan Hello Dylan! We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing a disruption in your service. Unfortunately, these things can happen from time to time. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/bvCeNLNjM4 We'll be happy to help you. - C
@jacewhitten @jacewhitten Hi Jace! If you are experiencing issues and are in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/KGQwSHrOyi We will be happy to help you. - C
@gorddahlen @gorddahlen Hey there Gord! If you need help finding your voucher, please send us a DM: https://t.co/0FHXIQTFR2 with your reservation details and we will be happy to assist you. - C

@CG71791 @CG71791 Hi Corey. We are sorry to hear of your frustration. If you are in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/Bv65j1gqRD We will be happy to help you in any way we can. - C

@Norma36802940 @Norma36802940 Hi Norma! We're sorry to hear that you are having a negative experience. For this, you are welcome to contact our disability team with any questions or concerns that you may have. If you need more info on that, please send us a DM: https://t.co/BXHBRRwydD - C
@lapeluax10 @lapeluax10 Nice shot! 😍 - C

@LoganT1997 @LoganT1997 Hi Logan! Thanks so much for taking the time to share your positive experience and recognize our efforts. We appreciate you and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again in the future. Cheers! 🙂 - C
#togetherwefly

@skyhoney2003 @skyhoney2003 Hi there Caroline! Thanks for reaching out today. You are able to add baggage to your reservation on our official website under "Manage Travel". However, you cannot add baggage to a flight once you have checked in. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - C

@freston4 @freston4 Hi Randy! We're sorry to hear that you are experiencing a delay. If you would like more information regarding this disruption in service, please send us a DM: https://t.co/HkjibwAY5d  with your reservation details so that we can investigate for you. - C

data.text: @howmuch4theox @howmuch4theox We completely understand that the decision to travel right now is a personal one that involves many considerations. Rest assured that whenever you're ready to travel, we'll be excited to welcome you on board! - SG

@TheOnlyKAVIN @TheOnlyKAVIN Hi Karin. We require everyone--passengers and team members, alike--to wear a face covering at all times. You can find additional information about our face covering policy by visiting https://t.co/1BJGfXwvAK. - SG

@MattKnight913 @MattKnight913 Hi Matt! Unfortunately we recently extended our schedule through mid-April and that route is not scheduled. You can always find our most up-to-date flight schedule on our website! - SG

data.text: The research is done and the results are in. All three major commercial airplane manufacturers—including Airbus—have found that you’re more likely to be struck by lightning than to contract COVID on a flight. Check it out! https://t.co/qYGCc6Eqz2

@mackiejane @mackiejane To facilitate screening, we suggest that you purchase a temporary or permanent crematory container made of a lighter weight material, such as wood or plastic. The final decision rests with TSA on whether to allow any items on the plane. - Lupe

@mackiejane @mackiejane If the container is made of a material that generates an opaque image and prevents the Transportation Security Officer from clearly being able to see what is inside, then the container cannot be allowed through the security checkpoint. - Lupe
@mackiejane @mackiejane Out of respect to the deceased and their family and friends, under no circumstances will an officer open the container even if the passenger requests this be done.  - Lupe

@mackiejane @mackiejane Our deepest condolences go out to you and your family. Passengers are allowed to carry a crematory container as part of their carry-on luggage, but the container must pass through the X-ray machine. - Lupe

Keep calm and grab your carry-on.

📸: jqstays https://t.co/Ci9R2uvXpr

data.text: @cgcmh1 @cgcmh1 Hi Chris! All customers are required to wear a face covering over their nose and mouth at all times when traveling to help protect them and those around them. If you see someone not wearing a mask, please don't hesitate to alert the nearest Allegiant representative. -C

@Puppyraiser @Puppyraiser We're disappointed to hear this. Our crew members are expected enforce our policies and safety measures to the best of their abilities. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/bXDBWrKF4A w/ your reservation details so that we may investigate this matter further. - C

@Puppyraiser @Puppyraiser Hi Leigh! All customers are required to wear a face covering over their nose and mouth at all times when traveling to help protect them and those around them. If you see something that needs to be addressed, please alert the nearest Allegiant team member. - C

@AKKnapp12 @AKKnapp12 Hi there! We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing a disruption in your service. Unfortunately, daily operational challenges sometimes interfere with our schedules, with little notice. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. We'll be happy to help you. - C

@AntoniMagdos @AntoniMagdos Hi Antoni! We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing a delay. If you have specific questions regarding your flight, please send us a DM: https://t.co/taofFUU4bu with your reservation details so that we can look into it for you. - Charles

@price_debbie @price_debbie Hi Debbie! We are very sorry to hear you were unable to utilize priority access. Please send us a DM with your confirmation number and email address on file. A member of our team would be happy to review your flight details. -Jenna https://t.co/TD4Hk4VPie

These volatile organic compound (VOC) filters may be small, but they're as mighty as they come! Thanks to them, the air quality on board always exceeds HEPA standards. #GoingTheDistance https://t.co/uNur1xanwO
@Ethan_Narber @Ethan_Narber We appreciate the feedback, Ethan, and will definitely pass it along to our teams. Thanks for flying with us! - SG
@kingraehailey @kingraehailey I'm sincerely sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. Please feel free to send us a private message if you need any assistance from our team. - SG

data.text: @Zoomph @budlight @thesportsatlas @NFL @Bose @Zoomph @budlight @thesportsatlas @NFL @Bose https://t.co/DTqujmYQQw
@kriskovalcik @kriskovalcik Hi Kris--please send us a private message so someone from our team can assist you! - SG

@jennannlove @jennannlove We are very sorry to hear of her canceled flight and for any inconvenience. Allegiant and all other airlines are working diligently to maintain as many scheduled flights as possible. If she is in need of assistance, please have her reach out to us directly. -Jenna

@stef_snaps @stef_snaps Our fares work on a tier-based system, which means that only so many tickets are available at a certain price. Once those lower priced tickets are sold, the ticket prices will go up to the next price level. - Lupe
